 /format ((16X,F9.4)) def

 /scale_min -132.0 def
 /scale_max -60.0 def
 :variable

\begin{ingrid}

/lon {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .lon /scale_min -132.0 def /scale_max -60.0 def} defasvarsilent

/lat {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .lat /scale_min 20.0 def /scale_max 52.0 def } defasvarsilent

/elev {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .elev } defasvarsilent

/Name {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .Name } defasvarsilent

/state {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .state } defasvarsilent

/comp1 {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .comp1 } defasvarsilent

/comp2 {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .comp2 } defasvarsilent

/comp3 {(/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcnstns.nc) readCDF .comp3 } defasvarsilent


% [ /NVZ 5 NewIntegerGRID T | STNID ] (/data/mbell/dldata/cdiac.d/ushcn_daily.d/us_stns.d/%06d[STNID].txt) [ STNID ] readdatafile:
%%((11X,F6.2,3(1X,A1),1X,F5.1,3(1X,A1),1X,F4.0,3(1X,A1),1X,F4.0,3(1X,A1),1X,F4.0,3(1X,A1)))formatted
%((11X,F6.2,7X,F5.1,7X,F4.0,7X,F4.0,7X,F4.0))formatted
%:readdatafile

%definevariables:

variable:
/name (prcp) def
/long_name (precipitation) def
/standard_name (lwe_precipitation_rate) def
/units (inches/day) def
/missing_value -99.99 def
grids: T | STNID :grids
file:
decdirect
%/name (/data/mbell/dldata/cdiac.d/ushcn_daily.d/us_stns.d/ushcn_prcp.r4) def
/name (/Data/data23/CDIAC/USHCN/Daily/ushcn_prcp_decdirect.r4) def
:file
:variable

variable:
/name (snowfall) def
/standard_name (thickness_of_snowfall_amount) def
/units (inches/day) def
/missing_value -99.9 def
grids: T | STNID :grids

decdirect

:file
:variable

/missing_value -99. def
